EmailTemplate.subject: Session Recap: Operationalizing Data Analytics with Pivotal & Forrester
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Maybe you weren’t able to join us for the Operationalizing Data Analytics <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-forrester-operationalizing-data-analytics-webinar> webinar, or maybe you just didn’t quite catch that one specific bit of information from Greg Chase (Director of Data Product Marketing, Pivotal) and guest speaker Brian Hopkins (VP and Principal Analyst, Forrester Research, Inc.).
Either way…Pivotal’s got you covered.
This session featured use cases driving Hadoop adoption and explored what is needed to transform initial investments into results. Please feel free to watch the on-demand replay here <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-forrester-operationalizing-data-analytics-webinar> and check out the slides here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/operationalizing-data-analytics>.
For more information about Pivotal Data Suite, and the other technologies that were discussed, please visit:
- Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data> - Download Pivotal HD <https://network.pivotal.io/products/pivotal-hd> - Enterprise SQL on Hadoop <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/sql-on-hadoop> - Big Data @ Pivotal blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal> - The Future Architecture of the Data Lake <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/the-future-architecture-of-a-data-lake-in-memory-data-exchange-platform-using-tachyon-and-apache-spark>
We look forward to sharing more insights with you at our next webinar.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
